headline: F5 Launches BIG-IP v21.0 to Power Application Delivery and Security in the AI Era
summary: SEATTLE, November 18, 2025--F5 (NASDAQ: FFIV) today introduced BIG-IP v21.0, giving customers a unified approach to app delivery, security, and scale in the AI era. This major release extends the F5 Application Delivery and Security Platform (ADSP) with a purpose-built delivery engine for application workloads—reducing operational friction, accelerating data movement, and improving performance and resiliency across hybrid and multicloud environments.
